citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 15:20 on
05-Jul-18.
An adult female relative came to the door of the residence and stated that the licensee was not at the site.
